proposalCreationPage.giveProposalName: Give the proposal a name. The name must be unique!

proposalCreationPage.imgRecommendations: Text-free and high resolution image recommended
proposalCreationPage.setupTimelineP: By setting up tasks and events, community members can be informed about your proposal progress. It makes your proposal more validated and trustworthy as the community will always know where you are in your delivery timeline.

proposalCreationPage.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
proposalCreationPage.addMonthlyBudget: Add your monthly budget in EOS
proposalCreationPage.budgetEos: Budget is allocated and paid in EOS!

validationMessages.minLength: The field must be at least {numberOfChars} characters long
validationMessages.maxLength: The field must be at most {numberOfChars} characters long
validationMessages.proposalNameRegex: A proposal can have lower case english characters or numbers 1-5 only
validationMessages.latinNoSpecialsRegex: Only english characters are allowed, special characters are not allowed
validationMessages.onlyNumbersDecimals: Only numbers and decimals are allowed
validationMessages.allowedVideo: Only youtube, youku, tudou, and iqiyi are allowed
validationMessages.minValue: The value must be at least {value}
validationMessages.maxValue: The value must be at most {value}
validationMessages.urlString: The field must be a URL

notifications.durationErr: Duration must be at least 1 month and at most 6 months
notifications.budgetErr: Monthly budget must be at least 100 EOS
notifications.budgetErrMax: Monthly budget cannot be greater than {maxMonthlyBudget}
notifications.milestonesEmpty: Add at least one timeline item
notifications.proposalNameExists: A proposal with the same name already exists! Try another one
notifications.scatterIsNotConnected: Scatter is not connected. Please install/open Scatter plugin or desktop application and refresh this page.
notifications.tooManyItems: Too many items. The number cannot be more than 15
